io.purplejs.core

Interface EngineBinder


  • public interface EngineBinder
    This class is used to bind configuration values to the engine. It is used by the EngineModule.

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Abstract Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      EngineBinder disposer(Consumer<Engine> disposer)
      Binds a disposer that is executed when the engine is disposed or if the script cache is expired.
      EngineBinder globalVariable(String name, Object value)
      Adds a global variable to the script engine.
      EngineBinder initializer(Consumer<Engine> initializer)
      Binds an initializer that is executed when the engine is created.
      <T> EngineBinder instance(Class<T> type, T instance)
      Binds an instance to a type.
      <T> EngineBinder provider(Class<T> type, Supplier<T> supplier)
      Binds a provider of a type.

    • Method Detail

      • instance

        <T> EngineBinder instance(Class<T> type,
                          T instance)
        Binds an instance to a type.
        Type Parameters:
        T - type of instance.
        Parameters:
        type - type to bind.
        instance - instance of the type.
        Returns:
        the instance of this binder.

      • provider

        <T> EngineBinder provider(Class<T> type,
                          Supplier<T> supplier)
        Binds a provider of a type. Can be used for non-singleton services or values.
        Type Parameters:
        T - type of instance.
        Parameters:
        type - type to bind.
        supplier - the supplier (or factory) to create an instance of type.
        Returns:
        the instance of this binder.

      • globalVariable

        EngineBinder globalVariable(String name,
                            Object value)
        Adds a global variable to the script engine.
        Parameters:
        name - name of variable.
        value - variable instance.
        Returns:
        the instance of this binder.

      • initializer

        EngineBinder initializer(Consumer<Engine> initializer)
        Binds an initializer that is executed when the engine is created.
        Parameters:
        initializer - initializer to bind.
        Returns:
        the instance of this binder.

      • disposer

        EngineBinder disposer(Consumer<Engine> disposer)
        Binds a disposer that is executed when the engine is disposed or if the script cache is expired.
        Parameters:
        disposer - disposer to bind.
        Returns:
        the instance of this binder.
